casebody.data:
Clara L. Totten, appellant, v. Cassius H. Read, respondent. Decided February 4, 1884. Appeal from an order directing the plaintiff to serve a bill of particulars. I. T. Williams, for appellant; Christopher Fine, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Truax, J.

Memorandum Per Curiam. Order modified, and as modified affirmed, without costs to either party.
